scripts.build: git submodule sync && rimraf .cache && rimraf public && gatsby build
scripts.deploy: rimraf --glob "dist-remote/chorus/*" && cpx "public/**/*.*" "dist-remote/chorus" && cd dist-remote/chorus && git add . && git commit -m "Update" && mkdir -p ~/.ssh && echo ${SSH_KEY} | sed "s/_/\n/g" > ~/.ssh/id_rsa && chmod og-rwx ~/.ssh/id_rsa && GIT_SSH_COMMAND="ssh -i ~/.ssh/id_rsa -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no" && git push -u origin main
